text: Revenge Body Participant Wants to Reverse the Cycle of Obesity in Her Family : ” I ’ m Very Scared of Becoming My Parents ” on Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian Nicole is not trying to follow in her parents ’ footsteps. In this clip from Sunday ’ s Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian, Khloe Kardashian meets Nicole, who wants to break the cycle of obesity in her family. “ I ’ m very scared of becoming my parents, ” Nicole reveals. While Nicole ’ s mom has undergone weight loss surgery, …. Read Full Article
